mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNo}, #{memberGender}, #{memberDateOfBirth}, #{memberAddress}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PNO, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_DOB, MEMBER_ADDR, AUTHORITY, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTHORITY = 1

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_DEL_FL, SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(MEMBER_DOB, 7, 2) MEMBER_DOB, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTHORITY = 1 ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
